item.title: :book: a non-scientific literature review
item.description: Why this project? Reading classic literature / fiction is still one of my all time favourite activities. My apartement is filled with books (yes - the old-fashioned printed book ðŸ“–) and I treasure the moments when I can sit somewhere quiet and just enjoy reading. German
